name: Bridge Cannoneer
description:
Directions: 

Play in full screen to see whole game! (Don't know why, but it works that way)

Movement -

  1.  A & D or Left & Right Arrow Keys

Shooting -

  1.  Left Mouse-click for cannon 
  2.  Cannon points toward mouse pointer
  3.  W or E keys for Ninja Star and Riceball
  4.  S key for both Star and Rice

In this brick breaker style game you'll be taking control of a troupe of Ninjas and their Sensei to take down all the bridges leading in and out of the city!
